Instrument.name: The Dust Particle Detector (SP-2) for Vega 2
Instrument.description: The Dust Particle Detector (SP-2) on Vega 1 and Vega 2 were identical. The SP-2 was an acoustic detector consisting of three piezo-electric elements mounted on a membrane. Two of these elements were connected to identical recording circuits while the third was users as a source of stimuli for calibration. It had a mass measurement range of 3x10^13 to ~2x10^-6 g, divided into 16 channels. The channel sensitivity levels were logarithmically distributed across the dynamic range.
